means: 非国教徒的非法或秘密聚会

sentence.Network_en: She become equally averse to the church and the conventicle.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对教堂和非国教教派的秘密集会处变得同样地不喜欢.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇新译 C_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... convent 女修道会 conventicle 秘密聚会 convention 常规.
colan... ... naturally 自然地, 以自然力, 天生地... conventicle 集会, 非国教徒的秘密聚会... potation 喝, 一口的量, 饮酒.
十五级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... contrition n. 悔罪， 痛悔 conventicle n. 非国教徒的秘密聚会 coordination n. 协调.
convent 罗玛姑娘院, conventicle 集会场所, conventer 转炉

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the general sense 'assembly, meeting', particularly a clandestine or illegal one): from Latin conventiculum ('place of) assembly', diminutive of conventus 'assembly, company', from the verb convenire (see convene)

means.word_mean: 1. a secret unauthorized meeting for religious worship
2. a building for religious assembly (especially Nonconformists, e.g., Quakers)
